content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of another thunderstorm from my roof in anderson, trying to catch the lightning flashes. this string of multi-colored lights appeared in one picture. i didn't see it when the picture was taken and there isn't anything in that direction to explain it. it isn't caused by moving the camera since the roof in the foreground is clear. i thought it might be pearl lightning or the start of a lightning strike but i don't know what it really was.
content.summary: String of lights in the sky in photo of evening thunderstorm

content.detailedDescription: I took a couple dozen pictures of an approaching thunderstorm, trying to catch a picture of the lightning. after downloading the pictures i found the five balls of light in just one picture. i didn't see them when i took it. they're not stars because you can see the clouds in the background. they're not raindrops illuminated by the flash on my camera as i've seen in other pictures because the tree limbs about 50 feet away partly block the second one from the bottom and the bottom one is framed by the tree limbs about 100 feet away. the camera used was a vivicam 3785 3.0 megapixel. i searched sites on ball lightning and pearl lightning but this looks like neither of them.
content.summary: Five balls of light captured in photo of approaching thunderstorm

content.detailedDescription: We where swimming in or com.Pool many people where there and seen but most lost interest they where kids          country club in glen burnie md.21060.This was the second time i saw an object not known to me as a teenager myself and a friend saw 3 fire balls in a triangler shape hoovering over the creek as soon as we pointed them out they took off silent with no sound straight in too outespace.I dont know what these crafts where but ive worked with airplanes my whole life and these where not airplanes.I ve told these storys to friends by word of mouth an was joked at but i know what i saw an so do the othere peole there,i told bill bean a ufoman but he only cares to tell his storys i dont wont money or any gain from this it just a rare wonderfull thing to see god bless.P.S. remmber this happened years ago its just now i found this internet site goood luck kg
content.summary: At least 5 to 10 miles out while swimming in a community pool  many of us the swimmmers watched as object didnt move for overan hour my son and myself seemed too be the only ones to care.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home watching a web-cam view of downtown fairbanks, alaska when i noticed a bright light in the picture rising above a building in fairbanks.  i captured three images of the light and then a fourth picture after it had gone out of frame.  the web-cam is a south-looking camera overlooking fairbanks from the fairbanks daily news - miner building on the north side of fairbanks.  the web-cam is at www.Arcticcam.Com.
the light initially appeared as one very bright light in the first image, then two in the second image and then possibly three lights in the last.  the three images show the object over 51 seconds moving from south to north.  there is an air force base in the area (eielson afb), but the afb is almost directly east from the location of the web-cam, and not in the camera's viewing range.  i also have a picture a map showing the location of the web-cam, buy i can only upload three images.
content.summary: Bright light over fairbanks, alaska

content.detailedDescription: It was 9;30pm i went out to look for my cat, i was looking up at the stars in the southern sky, when a fast moving light in the sky,at first i thought that it may be a mylar baloon[they usual tumble in the wind],as it got closer it looked too big,it was a spinning disk with white light on its leading edge,brighter in the front, dimmer and the trailling edge, and holding a steading course,with a slight roll to the left and then to the right,then level flight,it look like a flying halo, but the object momentary blocked out a view of a star, so it was a solid object, there was no sound,and no clouds in the sky,  as it flew overheard my cat became scared and ran inside, i lost sight of the object due the roof of the house and ran to the backyard to see it again for a couple of seconds before my view was blocked by the trees. this was no aircaft that i have ever seen, and i have lived near kelly airforce base for more than half my life.
content.summary: A disk flying to the north from the south on a clear night with white light on its outer edge

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were walking home from our neighbors house along a long isolated driveway to our home in a rural area about 10 p.M.  
1) i first noticed what i thought to be a falling star but before i could bring it to my husband's attention it disappeared behing the tree line of a grove of trees immediately behind our house(they were approx. 150'away)-there are only open pastures and no other neighbors for more than a mile in that area.  then, as i said, "there it is again" he said he saw it as it appeared between an opening in the trees and literally, "bounced" two times toward the left (nw)disappearing behind the last tree in the grove; suddenly it reappeared as a larger, extremely intense round light that started or appeared to be moving straight toward us "through" the trees and i shouted that "it's coming towards us!" very frightened.  we both stopped walking just staring at it. my husband's thoughts were what is it and what is it doing here (in this isolated area). it disappeared.  a second later, it appeared directly below the same spot we had last seen it, only this time it was just a bright round sphere of light; it seemed to "go out" and reappeared with a "wispy" contrail/tail of broken light behind it moving suddenly and horizontially to the right; went "out" again then, reappeared and moved suddenly and horizontially to the left, still at what seemed to us to be ground level and in front of the trees and undergrowth.  it all happened so fast and with such unusual movements we were puzzled, apprehensive and started to question what it was, why it would be where it was and how did it move like that.  we continued to walk into our backyard still looking back at the trees, and went into the house.  the time was 10:10 p.M.  i called our neighbors where we had just had dinner and told jeremy what we had seen behind our house in his pasture.  he laughed and said that he would look for a crater tomorrow and i said he'll know what happened to us if we're not around tomorrow (abducted-ha ha...).  still talking about how weird it was, my husband and i decided to go back outside to the same spot where we had first seen what we thought was the falling star.  we were trying to get our bearings to find a reasonable explanation as to what we saw; blinking lights from a tower, neighbors lights, etc. nothing made any sense as we stood again at approximately the same spot as the first "sighting" and discussed what we had both seen and in what position or area we had seen the lights in for about 10 minutes.
2)  i was looking to the left of the area of where we had last seen the first series of "lights" at a shadowed area in the pasture that i knew was a very large slash pile (of dead brush and cedar trees).  i noticed flickers of light, but really too faint to be called "lights"-my first thoughts were fireflies but i knew that it in no way resembled a firefly and there weren't any around anyway.  then, another group of "flickers" appeared next to the first group.  i called attention to them to my husband who said he could see them too and again began questioning ourselves as to what "they" could be.  a few seconds passed and the group of "wispy, airy-like flickers" moved suddenly and horizontially just above ground level to the right (about 50') toward a white horse trailer parked in our yard.  the trailer was very visable as our eyes were adjusted to the darkness by then.  the flickers paused,  moved again toward the trailer another 10', paused just before the trailer, then shot straight up at an angle away from it, appearing to disapper into the center of a large oak tree (about 50' away)between a workshop shed and a horse barn.  we were in awe and amazement again at how "it" moved and seemed to not want to "run into" the horse trailer.  now we were both shaken and even more puzzled.  we discussed what we had just seen yet again and how it acted. weird, weird, weird. i was talking about not wanting to go to sleep in case it was something, locking the doors, etc.  my husband kept asking "what do you think it is?"  he had no idea and neither did i-we did talk about what it was not-someone with a flashlight, airplanes, neighbors lights, car lights, etc.  we hurried into the house.  he grabbed a flashlight and suggested that we go back out and watch for it in case "it came back".  i suggested we just sit on the back porch and watch, not wanting to back into the open.  it's about 10:45 p.M.
3) we sat on back porch quietly with our 2 dogs with a puzzled comment every now and again, but just staring into the darkness of the backyard.  the workshop shed is approx. 55' behind the porch; the thicket of trees is approx. 25' beyond the shed.  after about 15 minutes, my husband says, "there it is! see it?"  i said i couldn't; he said, "right there!"  i moved around in my chair because there was a utility pole that i thought was blocking my line of vision.  i still couldn't see anything, then there it was-a distinct, bright,round light moving just above the ground to my left, then disappeared; appeared to the far left again about 25' away, then disappeared; reappeared about 10' back to the right again, then disappeared.  now we were in total shock and couldn't believe what was happening to us, no one will believe us, people will say were crazy but we know what we saw!  i just wanted to go into the house and lock the doors. it was 11:15 p.M. we sat in the living room trying to watch tv until midnight, looking out the back windows into the backyard and toward the trees "just checking" if there was anything there.  we went to bed and layed awake for some time still going over and over what we saw and trying to find a reasonable explanation.

my husband went out into the pasture first thing this morning, sunday the 21st, to see if could see or find anything. nothing.  i was gone for the day but when i got home we both went out to look all around the area again. nothing-i commented that lights don't leave any physical evidence behind.  ???

i made rough sketches of the 3 events immediately after they happened, but have not attached them, as i am not that familiar with the computer in that respect.

it's 9:50 p.M. sunday, 5-21-06  my husband is outside again on the porch "watching".

any reasonable explanation, please?
content.summary: First appeared to be a falling star but then bounced twice disappearing behind the trees; appeared suddenly again as a larger, intense light coming thru the trees moving toward us; disappeared/reappeared many times with different intensity/shape/direction

content.detailedDescription: I took about 50 pictures while walking around the field by my house this morning(and also while sitting in a lawn chair. in fact it was sitting down when i shot the following photo. there is a possibility that it might be a big bird but it looked too suspicious for me not to send it in. i enclose the original and one enlargement.
content.summary: Suspicious looking object flying over my land today.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a walk in shute farm, a countryside walk with my brother and his girlfriend just outside warminster, wiltshire. we were on high land and was looking at the landscape when i noticed the light/object just above the trees. i considered it could of been the reflection of something. it seemed to shimmer and move up and down, though not much. we decided to get a closer look although the light was at least half a mile away. i walked back down the path and got to a clearing and the light was no longer there.
content.summary: Shimmering light just outside warminster, sighted whilst on a walk up shute farm. light was just above forest trees of either shearwater or other woodland in the area.

content.detailedDescription: I was nine years old when i took the picture out of a car window.  the picture had been moved from house to house in boxes over the years and the object was not realized until a few years ago. i'm not sure what the object is since i don't have the negative but looking at the texture of the print it is not a smudge or mark put on later, it is in the print.  the picture was not taken through glass, the window was down.
content.summary: A snapshot taken in 1977 at a safari park in beauleigh, england

content.detailedDescription:
Coming out of the house after dinner, walking out the driveway.
when looking up at the sky to check to see how much sunlight was left they caught my eyes and at first i thought they were a group of ducks heading south but it was summer and ducks don't fly west and they don't shine. they were westbound at about 25 to 30,000ft. flying in a "v" shapped formation with fewer flying objects on one side of the "v" and more flying objects on the other side.
content.summary: 12 or 13 shinning, shapped flying objects. then they just zipped off on over san francisco and out of sight in about a second.

content.detailedDescription: Traveling on country road from mother-in-laws home back to our home. we notice a bright light shining from the object to the ground. having just gotten out of the air force in air craft control and warning field, and aware of all types of aircraft this object was unlike any known at the time. the object was shining down onto a pasture and was stationery for about 5 minutes. the circumference on the light shining on the ground was about 50 feet. my wife and i stopped the car and got out to watch the object for the 5 minutes until the object quickly receseed and was gone in a westward direction. i stopped at the kershaw police department and asked if they had any reports of anything unusual and they said no, so we went home.  we did not pursue the matter.
content.summary: While driving spotted a stationary object in the sky shining a light onto the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on interstate 64 headed east. it was about 4:30 am with no traffic, when i looked up i saw what looked like a helechopter dropping a parachute, and as i came closer to the site i noticed it was very low to the ground. i slowly reduced  my speed,and pulled over to the side of the road, and stopped about 200 hundred feet from this object.I then rolled my window down to see what it was, and as i looked around the area i noticed a source of water maybe a creek behind a row of trees. when i got streight across from this object that made no sound at all it started moving very slowly behind the trees as i followed it. it came to a stop after 50 feet or so.My wife sitting next to me also was amazed, as we were parked on the side of the road just staring at it we could see a very large window shaped area with two or maybe three small round lights.One light was red, and the other one was green. after sitting there for two or three minutes staring at it my wife said lets get the hell out of here, so we left. i can't understand what at first looked like a helechopter from a distance with no sound what so ever could change it's shape like that. this object was only 15 to 20 feet from the ground. i also remember seeing some type of factory or plant     not far behind this area.
content.summary: When i first seen this object it looked like a helechopter dropping a parachute.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on interstate 64 headed east. it was about 4:30 am with no traffic, when i looked up i saw what looked like a helechopter dropping a parachute, and as i came closer to the site i noticed it was very low to the ground. i slowly reduced  my speed,and pulled over to the side of the road, and stopped about 200 hundred feet from this object.I then rolled my window down to see what it was, and as i looked around the area i noticed a source of water maybe a creek behind a row of trees. when i got streight across from this object that made no sound at all it started moving very slowly behind the trees as i followed it. it came to a stop after 50 feet or so.My wife sitting next to me also was amazed, as we were parked on the side of the road just staring at it we could see a very large window shaped area with two or maybe three small round lights.One light was red, and the other one was green. after sitting there for two or three minutes staring at it my wife said lets get the hell out of here, so we left. i can't understand what at first looked like a helechopter from a distance with no sound what so ever could change it's shape like that. this object was only 15 to 20 feet from the ground. i also remember seeing some type of factory or plant     not far behind this area.
content.summary: When i first seen this object it looked like a helechopter dropping a parachute.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on i25 and i noticed an abnormally bright white star (about three times brighter and larger)above the highway several miles in front of me.  i continued driving a good 20 miles and throughout the duration, it kept on getting brighter, as if i was getting closer to it.  around the longmont area i was able to drive directly above it. i looked up and it seemed that it was hovering at about the height a helicoptor would fly at.  it was not very large (about the size of the moon at sea level) and it's base was triangular shaped.  one of the sides was slightly rounded and had three huge lights pointing northwest.  i could see circular structures on the base and it was a matted gray color.  it stood perfectly still.  i continued to watch it in my rearview mirror for about five miles when all of the sudden from standstill, it zoomed west going easily three times faster than a comercial jet (there was a plane in front of me, so i could estimate speed differences).  that same night i noticed two other bright lights like the one i drove under hovering above the rocky mountains.  every once in a while i notice the same lights in the sky (since i am now looking).  i'm sorry this came so late, but i only heard about you from a documentary i watched yesterday.  i was just wanting to know if a structure similar to this has ever been reported.  i have no physical evidence except my own experience.
content.summary: Saw bottom of it  in sky, triangle with a slightly rounded side, three lights on base, circlular structures underneath, gray

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the back seat of my mother's car. we were driving west on highway 56 from mcpherson to great bend, kansas. on highway 56, between windom and little river, i noticed a bright, blinking light on the western horizon in front of us. at first i thought it was a plane, until i noticed it was coming towards us at an incredible speed. from the farthest point of sight of the western horizon in front of us, the blinking light flew towards us a few feet above the power lines on the left side of the road - in 3 to 4 seconds. as it passed over us, i looked up. i saw nothing resembling a craft, just a large blinking orb. i turned my head back and watched the object continue its course above the power lines as it headed eastward toward the eastern horizon. within 3 to 4 seconds, it disappeared over the horizon. the entire incident lasted under 10 seconds and the object blinked brightly about 10 times. when the flying object was not blinking, nothing could be seen - just darkness. the object made no sound. the car did not rock and the power lines did not sway. it was just a bright, blinking light that traveled at least 16 miles within 10 seconds. i did not panic. i simply asked my mom, who was driving, and my brother, if they had witnessed the same thing that i had just witnessed. neither one of them claimed to have noticed it. i would have liked to have shrugged it off as an aircraft, but it made no sound and i do not believe any object can fly that fast without some sort of booming noise. i never spoke of the matter until i heard other people mention ufo sightings on the same highway.
content.summary: Blinking flash.

content.detailedDescription: I was in high school in the late 1980's, probably 1988 or 1989. three of us were just driving around the woodland area of mansfield, oh for an hour or two. it was a clear night, and a brilliant blue/white light was in the sky the entire time. it stayed in the same spot, and it appeared to be either a bright star or perhaps a planet. it was fairly high in the sky, not near the horizon. i remember we speculated on it. as we continued driving, the two of us in the front seat could see it through the windshield. suddenly, it shot off to the north/northeast at amazing speed.  it went so fast that it left a blue/white streak half-way across the sky before it disappeared.  at first we were excited because we thought it was a meteor.  however, it never got red...And even more odd we had seen it in the same exact spot for well over an hour before it moved. a few years after graduating college, i saw one of the friends again...And he remembered it too.
content.summary: Looked like a brilliant blue/white star, until it shot off to the north very fast

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was with my 13 year old son, alexander, coming from subway at the baseline shopping center, going to the bus stop in front of the department of commerce on broadway, in south boulder. i was looking west toward the flatirons and saw this dark object that looked like a boomerang floating above and behind the buildings and in front of the foothills. 
2. i noticed the object because it was fairly large and dark in a sky with grey clouds above the object holding just enough light from the setting sun to create distinct contrast.
3. at first i thought of a flock of geese because of the wedge formation they often take, but this made no sense rather quickly because of the mass of the structure.
4. the object was a lot like a boomerang. it was very dark in appearance and displayed no lights. the two "wings," which were equal in length and converging at close to a right angle, formed a pointed end or you could say they radiated from a pointed front. the ratio of the width of the "wings," relative to their overall length was approximately 1:6. the object seemed to be floating, and this sense was enhanced by a rotation of the object as it moved south, curiously almost as if a boomerang whirling in slow motion. yet before our bus arrived, it lingered in one spot for several minutes, although there was a breeze at ground level, so it appeared to have its own power, displaying hovering and rotation and variable speeds. i would estimate its size as rather large, perhaps having "wings" of 100 feet in length. i say this because i got some sense of how high it was - around 1,000 feet - as it moved in front of and near the flatirons. also, a small plane flew over it from the southeast going northwest into the mountains just before our bus arrived while the object was hovering in one place. 
5. when i realized i was looking at a solid object and not a flock of geese, i said to my son, "what do you think that is, ander," and pointed it out to him. then it began rotating and we just watched in amazement as it floated south. ander (alexander) noted right away that it had no lights. i attempted to take photographs of it, but it was too dark for it to appear in the digital images. nonetheless, the camera did reveal some closer objects in the night sky, light up by the flash. and i took one mpeg clip, but i don't know if i captured the object. also, i believe it is possible that the object began hovering in one place as a response to my camera flashes. i was excited about the event because i experienced a ufo sighting with my son.
6. the sky kept getting darker and our bus arrived, so it was very hard to see as we left, but still hovering.
content.summary: Walking along broadway in front of department of commerce complex, look up above flatirons and see large, dark boomarang shaped object floating north to south.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch looking directly to the west, about 10 decrease from the horizon i see an bright amberlight,(as bright as the brightest star in the sky) just appear in the sky. it was moving slowly to the north horizontal with the horizon at about the same speed most jetliners travel in the area. it then shot off at an superfast speed faster than a shooting star. it faded out in less than one second and could not be seen.I then said to my wife  ( wow) did you see that. it was only visible for about 20 seconds. after it disappeared i ran into the house to get my night vision. i then scanned the sky trying to find it but could not.
content.summary: Bright amber light,suddenly just apeared, moved slowly for 20 seconds, shot of to the north.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard which faces east. i looked up and saw 4 or 5 white little objects that were going pretty fast and you could barely see them. they were traveling from south to north and as they travelled all the objects combined into one object which after a few seconds of being one they disappeard completely. i thought maybe they were ballons from a car dealership but they were going way to fast and then too just disappear?  i wasnt really too shocked, this was not the first object in the las vegas sky that couldnt be described.
content.summary: In the east of the valley, i looked up and saw 4 or 5 white objects moving at a somewhat fast speed from south to north and as i watched the objects they combined into one object which after about a few seconds of being one, it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down my gravel road and i noticed a cloud that was forming and boiling very fast. i stopped my truck and watched the cloud. it was not very far off the ground. as i watched the cloud, a vehicle pushed out of the cloud for about 15 seconds. it only appeared part way out of the opaque cloud. it looked exactally like an underwater prob. it was rounded in the front, looked metalic, and had two lights that were not on. as soon as this ufo saw me or realized i was watching it, it receded into the cloud. i heard absolutely no noise of any kind and i got the distinct feeling i was not to tell anyone what i saw. i did not tell any one for about 3 months and only my husband. i report this since i have never seen any other description of a ufo like this shape, not that it could camoflauge itself into a cloud which it was making.  i am a retired english teacher and i do not report this for any publicity, but for your files. i watched a television program today on the history channel which is where i learned about mufon. i would be willing to take a lie dectector to prove i am telling the truth. this is for your records and research. i have no photos, no proof of any of this.
content.summary: I saw a cloud boiling, the front of a ufo appeared, stayed for about 20 seconds, then retreated into the cloud. it made absolutely no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the 15 fwy near victorville towards orange county,just began the uphill portion of the freeway when i noticed the craft at 2 o'clock straight in front of me thru the windshield of my car. i had no idea what i was looking at so i pulled to the shoulder and stopped, my friend seated in the passenger seat turned to me and said "do see that?" i responded "how could i not, it's so huge". it was on the desert side of mt. baldy blocking out a large portion of the mountain,not moving at all, then it moved horizontally torwards the west to the next mountain peak, made a right angle turn,and went straight up towards the stars at an incredible rate of speed till it was out of sight. the circle was a bright orange color but without any haziness, you could definitley see the outside edge of the object. after it disapeared vertically we both sat quietly for what seemed like a few minutes, then quized each other to see if we both saw the same thing. we sat on the shoulder for approximatly 15 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange circle hovering in front of mt. baldy seen from the desert side,huge,moved to the west in front of the mountain, then made a right angle turn at high vilosity straight up until it disapeared in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Mike (my longtime companion) were on our way home from uniontown, pa, when we both saw a strange ring of blue lights in the sky, we stoped the car to get a better look at the object, and we both could see a disc shape object with a ring of pulsating blue lights. we tried to get closer, but then the object flew away at an extreamly fast speed! we told only a few close friends and family members about what we saw. it's hard for people in this small town to believe this kind of thing? i don't know who ealse may have seen the object? we saw it very clearly. i wish i had a camera or camcorder, but we didn't. this isn't something that you would think can happen in this small town? mike and i were both feeling as if we lost some time doing our sighting, because what shoul've been a short trip (6 min.) from nearby uniontown, took about 50 minutes? mike didn't want to talk about it whenever i brought up the subject, so i let it drop until now! i've had many dreams about it over the past few years. my sister told me that when she that in 1974, she and her husband saw something like the object mike and i saw on the nearby farmland? i don't know what it all might mean, but i wish i could find out? ever since i was about five years old, sometimes i would wake up with the feeling that someone was in my room? i know that i sound like one of those people who say they've been abducted by aliens, but i'm not saying that, but the ufo mike and i saw that early evening in may 2004 makes me think about a possible conection? sincerely; dirk hartman
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Disk with blue lights hovered for 15 mins then sped away at fantastic speed

content.detailedDescription: I was driving through new mexico east across i-10, while passing through gage, nm i happened to notice what i thought was a micro wave tower.  as i was looking at it while driving i didn't notice the tower which i thought it should be attached to. i pulled over and started taking pictures. i could tell it was flying but it didn't have any lights so i knew it wasn't a plane and it made no noise.  i drove a little further to get a shot from another angle and this is what i did for the next 40 minutes drive a little further after taking a few more pictures trying to get another angle of the object.  i didn't move it just hung there in the sky no sound, no movement.  i was amazed because although i consider myself a little skecptic about these kind of things this was something i could not explain and i was looking at it with my own eyes.  i got a little nervous feeling and got back on the highway trying to put as much distance between me and that thing as i could. i have sent the photos to friends and they haven't replied. i would just like to know what it is.
content.summary: I don't know if it was a ufo, but it was flying, no noise, no lights, never seen anything like it before.

content.detailedDescription: I was working and i pointed it out two 2 other men i saw a flash like the sun shinning off it.It seemed not to move frist i thought it way be a satelite
content.summary: I was working on a school and i happened to look up and saw it glisten and watched it for about 25 min didnt seem to move then it slowly went two the sw

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard and my son and i was trying out are new million candle lite from home depot. we watched the beem go way up in the sky. i aimed at a jet liner that was about 40,000 ft high by acendent. and stoped after a few sec. i turned around and started to walk inside the house when i turned to the right and saw a light come down and hover about a half mile out and no sound. i was stoped in my tracks and felt like i was being watched. a few sec. and it disapaired as fast as it appared. i say your net site and finialy feel not afried to tell anyone that i didnt know well. i know how and why things fly so fast and feel that the usa i behind alot of these sitings. i felt good that i was checked out i feel the us sould be aware . thanks ralph porro
content.summary: I saw a lite in the sky that seemed to watch us. it cam and went  and no sound

content.detailedDescription: My mother actually observed the object. we were driving through kansas at an unknown location. as we were driving, she looked over and saw a bright object hovering over the ground. she thought it may have been a water tower or oil drill. as we got closer, she was able to see that the object had no legs and was floating approximately 100 ft above the ground. we continued to drive and the object eventually vanished.
content.summary: Ufo landing in field with lights

content.detailedDescription: At home star gazing  2: the light  3:ufo  4:not the first time
content.summary: Just sat there. with a dim light rotating around it  a plane came in and gone in a blink of an eye

content.detailedDescription:
When we moved to calif from washington in 1953 i knew i would no longer be able to breath two nostrals worth of air in only one side of my nose. as we drove past the volcano mt. hood in oregon, the base was covered with clouds and i saw the tip of it in the sky and knew that was where they lived. i thougt no more than that about it until years later after going to a shrink and reading whitneys book.I went into hypnosis and the spider had a alien head. i ran away from the shrink who hypnotised me.  i then went to the place where i was held by the spider web and there was a sign on a stake on the ground,
"a glance into the forest, is a window into the universe." i have a little bump in the back of my neck i have always wondered what it is. the doctors have always told me to leave it alone. i would like to have it removed by you. i was born in la grande oregon st. josephs hospital, july 28 1944 at 5:25 pm 100 years, 1 month 1 day and the same hour and most likely a few minute and seconds after joseph smith was shot on june 27 1844. a bullet stopped the poctet watch on john taylor at 5:16 pm and joseph died a few minutes after that. richard willard was also in jail with the two of them. my ex husband who tried to kill me was richard, and  john willard was his lawyer, not taylor. too far out for coincidence. please contact me. i have many miracles.
content.summary: I was skipping backwards ahead of family on a path at the base of mt. raineer in 1948. i was only 4 and was held in a giant web and saw a giant spider.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the field in front of my house this morning taking a few sky pictures and caught this picture of this disk like object almost straight up over my house. i enclose the original and two enlargements.
content.summary: Object photographed over house

content.detailedDescription:
I just saw your organization on the history channel, and figured id report what i saw several years ago.

around 2001 i was 16, by buddy was spending the night and we snuck out onto my roof to sneak a cigerette. after about 10 minutes we see a light far off, as it gradually gets closer we relize that the light is pointed at us. not only that, but it is actually some sort of spotlight, we literally looked behind us, and could see our shadows on the woods behind my house.

as it gets closer, we can tell that its a triangle shape, unlike anything ive ever seen, with blue lights outlining the shape, and the spotlight coming from the center. the closer this thing got, the house seemed to shake with the noise that it made, yet no ones lights seemed to go on inside their house. 

by the time it got around 500 or so feet away it stopped, it was still tremendously loud, but it stopped moving, and just hovered. i was extremely scared as i didnt know what the hell it was, so i looked at my friend, as he stands up and literally pulls his pants down and moons the object. i swear to god, he puuled down his pants to it and slapped his ass yelling "come on mother fucker". 

as i watched this, i looked behind me again, just to make sure this thing was looking at us, and one again, our shadows were on trees, there was no mistaking that it was looking at us. as it started to move again, it was going directly above us, and just as soon as it did, the light went off, and it all noise stopped, literally, their was no noise, not crickets, not me, just dead silence.

suddenly, it took off behind the woods at a speed that i could only make out the lights of it, and not the shape, ive never seen anything go so fast. as soon as i could collect myself i asked him what the hell he did that for, and he told me that if he was going to be abducted (as he told me he thought he was) he was at least going to make a point while doing it.

now im not saying this was an alien object, as we do live several miles from wright patt airforce base, but what ever it was, it was nothing i had seen before or since (and no it was not a stealth bomber). 

my friend and i have fell out of touch since i moved to california, i have not spoke to hime in more than a year.
content.summary: Spot light, extremely loud noise, suddenly stealth
